attributes.action: urge the population to call our currency by its correct name of penny (plural pence or pennies) instead of the usual slovenly and disrespectful "pee".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The unit of currency is the penny, plural pence or pennies. The old penny was never called a "dee".

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
